transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Ha mam, mai Rishab baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se Muskan ke mamle me.
Customer: Ha ji boliye.
Executive: Ji mam bataiye mai kaise help kar sakta hu, Muskan ko call kar rahe Rishab aaj.
Customer: Ha. Actually mera jo ye Allen Bradley ka hum log sell karte hai, okay?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: But usme kya hai na inquiry aati hai turant expire ho jati hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To iska koi solution hai? Kyuki abhi bhi do teen inquiry aayi. Abhi aayi to wo turant expire ho gayi matlab jabki mai wo screen bhi ab khol ke baithi. Maine kaha theek hai abhi aur kuch kaam nahi mai ye screen khol ke baithti hu. To utni der me just scroll karne me hi expire ho gaya.
Executive: Mam ye jo product hai na, product me competition thoda sa high ho rakha hai abhi. Aur jaise hi lead aata hai to wo tumhare immediately aapke jaise aur supplier consume kar lete honge. Jiski wajah se wo expire ho ja raha hai.
Customer: To sir kuch to iska solution nikaliye na isme to jo
Executive: Mam aapne I am interested mark kare hai aisi leads me mam?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Kab mark kiya tha last mam aapne I am interested?
Customer: Sir jaise ab jaise abhi wali aayi to ab mai usko contact by karti hu. Utni der me wo expire ho jata hai aur expire hote hi delete matlab us screen pe show hi nahi hota search karne ke baad bhi. To in my interest interest wo show bhi nahi ho pata hai ki us pe bhi mai click kar pau.
Executive: Mam aap abhi ek baar location bataiye bylead wala ek baar refresh kariye ek bylead abhi zero seconds pehle aayi hai. Ek baar check kariye ye wali lead aapke relevant hai?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Ye relevant nahi hai. Mam aap laptop pe online ho ya fir mobile pe online ho?
Customer: Laptop. Aap aap dekhiye jaha par contact the buyer naam ka button aa raha hai waha par ek option aa raha hai usi ke right side pe pass leads ka. Contact.
Customer: Ek second kaha par?
Executive: Jaha par pehle bylead pe click kiya humne?
Customer: Bylead pe hi click hai.
Executive: Bylead pe right side bottom corner help aa raha hai.
Customer: Ha aa raha hai.
Executive: Uske upar dekhiye pass leads aa raha hai mam first option.
Customer: Help ke upar balance hai, balance ke upar buyer profile hai, buyer profile ke upar pass leads hai.
Customer: Nahi wo to nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Ek second ha aa raha hai. Chaliye wo please ke chakkar me dikhega. Ha boliye.
Customer: Pass leads pe click kariye na.
Executive: Kar diya.
Executive: Mam yaha par aapke paas jitni bhi leads jo expire ho gayi hai wo show hoti hai. Kisi bhi karan se hum us samay active nahi the to hum wo lead yaha par dekh sakte hai.
Customer: Ha. Theek hai.
Executive: To agar aisi leads aapko chahiye to waha par ek option aa raha hai I am interested.
Customer: Okay wo mai kar deti hu.
Executive: Ha us par click kar lijiye mam us tarike ki kuch leads aur generate hongi to aapko thoda sa priority par hum show kar payenge waha par.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Aur sir agar refund karwana ho to?
Executive: Mam aisa to koi option hamare paas hai nahi kyuki kahi na kahi services aapke pura aapko clarity ke sath dikhaya gaya tha pehle.
Customer: Nahi actually mere ko nahi ho raha hai matlab ek bhi pure dedh do mahina ho gaya hai. Ek bhi convert nahi hua na to upar se bhi mujhe pressure aa raha hai ki ya to ye.
Executive: Nahi wo mai samajh raha hu mam. Mam wo mai samajh raha hu ki lead convert nahi hua hai thoda sa demotivation hoga but I believe mam jis product me hum hai agar hum bylead consume kar paye uski easily to aap conversion yaha se le jayenge. Jis jitne keywords aapne hamare ko diye hue hai na mam is in keywords se related hamare paas hazar se upar buyer available rehta hai har mahine. Jiski lead post hoti hai.
Customer: Mujhe malum hai ye cheez.
Customer: But jaise ki ek bhi pure dedh do do mahine wale hone wale hai theek hai. Ji. Par ek bhi convert nahi hui hai to lagta hai na ki paisa waste ki ja raha hai.
Executive: Mam paisa waste nahi hota hamara kabhi bhi online. Online promotion hai na mam parso kisi se baat kar rahi thi aapke yaha pe.
Customer: Unhone to bahut ajeeb tarike se baat kiya.
Executive: Maafi chahunga mam agar aisa experience raha hamare yaha se. Kyuki but mam.
Customer: Hmmm bataiye. Unhone kaha agar aapko nahi wo ek to baat hi nahi samajh rahe the.
Executive: Maafi chahunga mam us cheez ke liye agar koi experience hamara kharab raha IndiaMART par. But mai itna samajhta hu mam jaise online presence hai hamara ye to powerflex electric ka online to promotion ho hi raha hai mam day by day. Agar google pe koi customer search karta hai hamare ko to multiple references ke through contact kar pata hai. Kuch customer aapko direct website ke through contact karenge kuch IndiaMART ke through contact karenge.
Customer: Actually nahi hai na direct bhi koi contact nahi kar raha hai na.
Executive: Ek second mam mai wo bhi check kar leta hu.
Executive: Mam direct contact se bility to ban rahi hai pichle mahine jaise humne service start hi kiya tha last month to us mahine hamare paas lagbhag 10 customer aaye the aur is mahine ka bhi data hamara fetch ho raha hai to usme thoda samay lagega but I believe ki is mahine bhi kuch customer directly aaye honge.
Customer: Abhi tak nahi aaye.
Customer: Last month bhi jo aaye the unka koi conversion nahi hua like puch ke wapis chale gaye.
Executive: Mam theek hai na sahi hai hamara. Abhi maine jaise kuch logo se contact kiya meri ek do maine Allen Bradley ki use kari to usme bhi kya hua na ki unhone price pucha aur fir gayab. Jaise abhi mere paas ek Rakesh naam se hai Jaipur ka hai.
Executive: What I will do mam?
Executive: Powerflex.com ye aap hi ka website hai na mam?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: To mai powerflex.com se ek baar product ko pura review kar leta hu apne end pe agar kuch aisa miss hai jo aapki website pe product dala hua hai aur yaha nahi dala hua hai wo sare keywords ko ek baar recheck kar leta hu aur fir uske hisab se agar koi changes hai to usme hum update lete hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Hai na? Muskan mam aaj chutti pe hai to in case aapko kuch bhi lagta hai aap mere ko isi number pe contact kar sakte hai for reviewing this particular website I will take one to two hours so what I will do I will give you a call at three or 3:15 mam.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Hai na us tak fir isko review kar lete hai and we will be able to come to some conclusion. Okay okay theek hai.
Executive: Okay mam thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Inquiries expire immediately after they arrive.

- Wants refund for the subscription.

- No leads are converting into sales.

- Had a bad experience with an IndiaMART executive.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested using the 'I am interested' feature.

- Executive will review the customer's website.

- Executive will recheck the keywords.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer at 3:00 or 3:15 PM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, subscription, website review
